1.0.name: wordpress/bartleby
1.0.description: Bartleby, the Scrivener, inspired by the Great American short story by Herman Melville, features a theme options panel, modern social icon fonts, and a two-column post display. Bartleby plays well with mobile devices and is fully responsive to adapt to mobile devices. It's based on the Foundation Grid by Zurb.
